title: Classic phishing
body:
Dear Customer,

Weâ€™ve detected suspicious activity on your account. To ensure your security, please verify your information immediately by clicking the link below:

http://secure-login-update.com

Failure to do so may result in temporary suspension of your account.

Thank you,
Security Team

title: Attachment bait
body:
Hello,

Your payment could not be processed. Download the attached invoice and update your information to avoid service interruption.

Click here: http://billing-update-info.com/invoice

Regards,
Billing Dept

title: Prize lure
body:
Congratulations!

You won a prize in our monthly lottery. Confirm your identity to claim the reward within 24 hours.

Claim now: https://claim-reward-prize.info

Best,
Promotions Team
